title: What The Latest Corporate Earnings Say About The Economy
teaser: We take a look at which industries and sectors are doing well and which are not - and what that says about the U.S. economy.
contentencoded:
It’s been a week of corporate earnings reports. Financial analyst Julianne Niemann joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to take a look at which industries and sectors are doing well and which are not and what the reports say about the U.S. economy.

Guest

  • Julianne Niemann, executive vice-president for research and portfolio management at Smith, Moore and Co.
